urls.title: footer
urls.description: The recommended check-in time depends on where you are departing from. Refer to our check-in page for recommended check-in and latest check-in times, or check the airport guide for overseas airports, or contact your local Qantas office for further information. Online check-in is available for Qantas and QantasLink Australian domestic bookings between 24 hours and 30 minutes before your flight departure. Online check-in for Qantas and QantasLink International bookings is available between 24 hours and 90 minutes before your flight.

urls.title: Fly with Australia’s most popular airline | Qantas US
urls.description: Experience all-inclusive service from the United States to Australia with Qantas. Enjoy inflight entertainment, refreshments and checked baggage on every flight.
